verses.verse: {A Davidic Song of Ascents} {The Significance of Unity} d Look how good and how pleasant it is when brothers live together in unity!
It is like precious oil on the head, descending to the beard even to Aaron's beard and flowing down to the edge of his robes.
It is like the dew of Hermon falling on Zion's mountains. For there the Lord commanded his blessing life everlasting.
